import './globals.css'
import { GoogleAnalytics } from '@next/third-parties/google'

export default function App({ Component, pageProps }) {
  return (
    <>
      <Component {...pageProps} />
      <GoogleAnalytics gaId="G-XY5W5DM87Y" />
      <script
        src="https://share.fastgpt.in/js/iframe.js"
        id="chatbot-iframe" 
        data-bot-src="https://share.fastgpt.in/chat/share?shareId=1evkscgqg0mes5jrb8gtx52i" 
        data-default-open="false"
        data-drag="false"
        data-open-icon="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        data-close-icon="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        defer
      ></script>
    </>
  )
}
